recipes.name: Idly sambhar
recipes.author: Preeti
recipes.description: This is a famous south Indian dish. It is served with various chutney.
recipes.instructions:
Soak rawa with water and curd, mix well and leave it for 30 mins.
Meanwhile use dal to prepare sambhar. Mix vegetables, tomoto, onion, ginger, and dry red chilli. 

You can also prepare green chutney.

Enjoy!

recipes.name: Paella
recipes.author: Juan Perez
recipes.description: Paella is a traditional Spanish rice dish that is commonly made with a variety of ingredients, including seafood, chicken, and vegetables.

recipes.name: Köttbullar (Swedish Meatballs)
recipes.author: Lena Svensson
recipes.description: Köttbullar are a traditional Swedish dish typically served with gravy, mashed potatoes, and lingonberry jam. They make a delicious and comforting meal.

recipes.name: Bigos (Polish Hunter's Stew)
recipes.author: Kasia Nowak
recipes.description: Bigos is a traditional Polish stew that is often referred to as the 'Hunter's Stew' because it is made with a variety of meats, including sausage and game. It is a hearty and flavorful dish that is perfect for cold weather.

recipes.name: Teriyaki Chicken
recipes.author: Akasuki Akina
recipes.description: A delicious and easy-to-make Japanese dish made with chicken marinated in a sweet and savory teriyaki sauce.

recipes.name: Matar paneer
recipes.author: Preeti
recipes.description: matar paneer is a delicious recipe
recipes.instructions: Steer on hot flame for 1 hr

recipes.name: Peanut Butter and Jelly Sandwich
recipes.author: Jane Doe
recipes.description: This classic sandwich is a childhood favorite and makes a quick and easy lunch option.
